text: aur isee prakaar, bahut-se mushrikon ke lie apanee santaan ke vadh karane ko unake banaaye hue saajhiyon ne sushobhit kar diya hai, taaki unaka vinaash kar den aur taaki unake dharm ko unapar sandigdh kar den aur yadi allaah chaahata, to ve ye (kukarm) nahin karate. atah, aap unhen chhod[1] den tatha unakee banaayee huee baaton ko
